div.p: The Apple Receptionist greets all guests, employees and visitors, professionally, courteously and respectfully.

The successful candidate will be a team player who enjoys taking on any small tasks or projects to support the company. The ability to multi-task with excellent interpersonal communication skills is a must. This role may include assisting other administrative staff with overflow work, including word processing, data entry and internet research tasks.
